id: GE Shares Fall Again, Hit New Low
paragraph:
November 17, 2018 General Electric Co.’s shares continued their long slide Monday even as new Chief Executive Larry Culp tried to put the market at ease about the direction of the conglomerate and its troubled power division.The stock fell as much as 10% Monday before recovering some of its loss to end at $7.99, down 6.9%. It was its first drop below $8 on an intraday and closing basis since March 2009. The...
